articles.title: South Africa vs Afghanistan Live Score, World Cup 2023: SA on top in middle overs, AFG looking to survive - Hindustan Times
articles.description: South Africa vs Afghanistan Live Score, Cricket World Cup 2023: Follow live score and updates of SA vs AFG from Ahmedabad here.
articles.content: Afghanistan are level on points with Pakistan and so they still have the slimmest of mathematical chances to make it to the top four on paper. But their net run rate is so poor that this slim chance … [+1817 chars]
